Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. This product has been meticulously designed and crafted to provide unparalleled performance and value. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection or business. For this exceptional opportunity, I am offering the product at a special introductory price of $15000. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. I look forward to hearing from you soon! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
